modules.title: Intro
modules.heading: Hey, I’m Ian!<small> A Developer, DevOps engineer, and brand experience creator from Rochester, NY.</small>
modules.content:
Deeply curious, mildly obsessive, and openly anxious; I’ve been helping to create code-backed brand experiences on and off the web for years. Check out some of my selected works.

I chase work that presents a problem to be solved or a facet I can make measurably improved with technology. While I have favorite tools in my bag of tricks, I have experience with a wide range of creative technologies. Have a look at my working history or some of the tech I routinely put to work for brands if you're interested in a bit more detail.

Anything else you would like to know about me? Drop me a line and I’ll most likely respond with an email packed with bulleted lists.
